com.mikebull94.rsapi

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpClient

    public interface Client
    Represents a client that can deserialize JSON and CSV resources into Java Objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CSVFormat CSV_FORMAT
      The comma-separated CSV format.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableList<CSVRecord> fromCSV(String url)
      Deserializes a CSV file from a specified URL into an ImmutableList of CSVRecords.
      <T> Optional<T> fromJson(String url, Class<T> classOfT)
      Deserializes a JSON file from a specified URL into an object of the specified type.
      <T> Optional<T> fromJson(String url, Type typeOfT)
      Deserializes a JSON file from a specified URL into an object of the specified type.

    • Field Detail

      • CSV_FORMAT

        static final CSVFormat CSV_FORMAT
        The comma-separated CSV format.

    • Method Detail

      • fromJson

        <T> Optional<T> fromJson(String url,
                         Type typeOfT)
                  throws IOException
        Deserializes a JSON file from a specified URL into an object of the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the desired object
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to deserialize from.
        typeOfT - The specific genericized type of src.
        Returns:
        An Optional containing an object of type T from the json, or Optional.empty() if the URL could not be deserialized.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • fromJson

        <T> Optional<T> fromJson(String url,
                         Class<T> classOfT)
                  throws IOException
        Deserializes a JSON file from a specified URL into an object of the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the desired object
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to deserialize from.
        classOfT - The class of T.
        Returns:
        An optional of object of type T from the json, or Optional.empty() if the URL could not be deserialized.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • fromCSV

        ImmutableList<CSVRecord> fromCSV(String url)
                          throws IOException
        Deserializes a CSV file from a specified URL into an ImmutableList of CSVRecords.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to deserialize from.
        Returns:
        An ImmutableList of CSVRecords.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
